articles.description: Studies say consuming carbs early in the morning, immediately after waking up can affect hormones such as dopamine, insulin and cortisol due to which you may feel insatiety and dull mood. | Health
articles.content: Do you start your day with high-carb foods like bread, biscuit, rusk or cereals and feel lethargic later? Your diet has a crucial role to play in not just weight loss, but also improving your mood, b… [+2232 chars]
